languages.text: "Не думала, что соглашусь с тобой, Вил'Джай. Неважно, куда клонятся чаши весов, если Неумирающий шепчет иначе. Ты — живое тому доказательство".

traits.locale_text: "Не думала, что соглашусь с тобой, Вил'Джай. Неважно, куда клонятся чаши весов, если Неумирающий шепчет иначе. Ты — живое тому доказательство".

languages.text: "I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."
languages.original_text: "Не думала, что соглашусь с тобой, Вил'Джай. Неважно, куда клонятся чаши весов, если Неумирающий шепчет иначе. Ты — живое тому доказательство".

traits.locale_text: "I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."
"I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."
"I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."
"I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."
"I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."
"I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."

languages.text: 「まさかお前と意見が一致する日が来るとは思わなかったよ、ジェイ。たとえ天秤がどう傾こうと、不死の者の囁きと食い違うなら、意味はない。お前はその生きた証だ」
languages.original_text: "I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."

traits.locale_text: 「まさかお前と意見が一致する日が来るとは思わなかったよ、ジェイ。たとえ天秤がどう傾こうと、不死の者の囁きと食い違うなら、意味はない。お前はその生きた証だ」

languages.text: "Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich mal einer Meinung mit Euch bin, Vil'Jae. Die Position der Waage ist unbedeutend, sofern das Flüstern des Todlosen ihr nicht widerspricht. Ihr seid der lebende Beweise dafür."
languages.original_text: "I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich mal einer Meinung mit Euch bin, Vil'Jae. Die Position der Waage ist unbedeutend, sofern das Flüstern des Todlosen ihr nicht widerspricht. Ihr seid der lebende Beweise dafür."

languages.text: « Je n'aurais jamais cru être un jour d'accord avec vous, Vil'Jae. La position de la balance importe peu si le murmure de l'Immortel la contredit. Vous en êtes la preuve vivante. »
languages.original_text: "I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'aurais jamais cru être un jour d'accord avec vous, Vil'Jae. La position de la balance importe peu si le murmure de l'Immortel la contredit. Vous en êtes la preuve vivante. »

languages.text: «Nunca imaginé que estaría de acuerdo con usted, Vil'Jae. La posición de los platos de la balanza importa poco si el susurro del Inmortal la contradice. Usted es la prueba viviente de ello».
languages.original_text: "I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca imaginé que estaría de acuerdo con usted, Vil'Jae. La posición de los platos de la balanza importa poco si el susurro del Inmortal la contradice. Usted es la prueba viviente de ello».

languages.text: “我从没想过我竟然会同意你的看法，敌者婕伊。如果天平本身违背了不死之神的低语，那无论天平向哪边倾斜都不重要。你就是个活生生的例子。”
languages.original_text: "I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."

traits.locale_text: “我从没想过我竟然会同意你的看法，敌者婕伊。如果天平本身违背了不死之神的低语，那无论天平向哪边倾斜都不重要。你就是个活生生的例子。”

languages.text: "Seninle aynı fikirde olacağımı asla tahmin edemezdim Vil'Jae. Şayet Ölmeyen'in fısıltısıyla çelişiyorsa terazinin yönü fark etmiyor, buna en iyi örnek de sensin."
languages.original_text: "I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."

traits.locale_text: "Seninle aynı fikirde olacağımı asla tahmin edemezdim Vil'Jae. Şayet Ölmeyen'in fısıltısıyla çelişiyorsa terazinin yönü fark etmiyor, buna en iyi örnek de sensin."

languages.original_text: "I never thought I would agree with you, Vil'Jae. The position of the scales matters not if the Undying One's whisper contradicts it. You are living proof of that."
